thread.title: 'Back to the Future' fans transform town into Hill Valley

author: senh
title: 'Back to the Future' fans transform town into Hill Valley
text: BING NEWS: 'Back to the Future' Fans Transform Town Into Hill Valley A picturesque town about 60 miles north of Los Angeles was transformed into the fictional hometown of Marty McFly from the "Back to the Future" franchise as part of a five-day fan event celebrating "Back to the Future" Day. Holland likened it to the secondary economy of a ski town. But everyone involved is very happy and very confident the town centre will transform Bracknell as a shopping destination and nghtspot. You may have noticed the former home of 3M in Bond Way is nothing more than a pile of rubble these days. Demolition of ... 06/5/2015 - 10:01 pm | View Link The future is already here, changing our lives (and our politics) Rachel Maddow points out that cars that drive themselves are a thing of the present, no longer a thing of the future, and similarly futuristic technology in the media and political journalism fields promise to transform the way politicians campaign.
